name: Under Desk PC Mount - No Drilling 50 lb Capacity, CPU Holder Under Desk, Adjustable Height and Width, Clamp-on Desk Leg PC Mount for Standing Desk (Fits 80mm×50mm Legs only), with Non-Slip Pads, Black
short_description: 【⚠Attention! Specialized PC Mount】You absolutely must measure your desk leg dimensions before purchasing to avoid returns! This mount is NOT universal. Available in 3 sizes, compatible fits only with desk leg dimensions: 2⁵⁄₈" (65mm)×1¾" (45mm), 3"(75mm)×1¾" (45mm), or 3⅛" (80mm)×2" (50mm). You must select the exact mount size that matches your desk leg measurement. Choosing the wrong size will result in an incompatible fit and it will not install

【Under Desk PC Mount】No drilling required. The U-clamp design securely attaches your PC to the table leg, elevating it to prevent kicks, bumps, dust, and moisture. Open-frame design ensures optimal airflow for better cooling and longer PC life
【Adjustable PC Holder】Fits most PC cases (5.7" to 9.84" wide), offering a wider adjustment range than competitors, Perfect for standing desks, works best with inverted legs (recommended)

【Heavy-Duty Design】High-strength steel holds up to 50 lbs. The mount clamps tightly at the top and bottom of your PC to prevent wobbling. Includes non-slip pads to protect your PC case from scratches and sliding
【Easy to Install】Hardware accessories and a detailed installation guide are included with this computer tower holder. We promise a 6-month guarantee period for this product
